language.name: English
settings.title: Settings
start.plot.0: As a passionate adventurer, I travel the world in search of dusty truths and hidden treasures.
start.plot.1: This time, my footsteps took me to the southern continent, where I heard that there was a hidden castle inhabited by a count hundreds of years ago. It was said that the count was a master of powerful magic, and he hid a great treasure in the castle when he passed away.
start.plot.2: However, it is also very difficult to get these treasures. When I find the castle, there are many traps waiting for me, and if I am not careful, I will be killed. Besides, to get the treasure, you have to solve a really difficult puzzle, and many people have given up at that point.
